name: Crunch With Leg Raise
benefits: The crunch with leg raise exercise targets the rectus abdominis and oblique muscles, so that the upper and lower abdominal muscles develop simultaneously.

name: Mountain Climber
benefits: Mountain climber are an effective cardio strengthening workout. It can help you strengthen and develop both upper and lower body muscles.

name: Front to Side Plank
benefits: Being a multi-functional movement, this exercise targets not only your abdominal muscles but also the spine and buttocks. Plank strengthens and tightens your entire body, improves your posture and balance, reduces body fat and can help speed up your metabolism.

name: Leg Raise
benefits: this exercise targets the rectus abdominus and oblique muscles, it is particularly useful for burning and tightening the lower fat.

name: Bicycle Crunch
benefits: a popular abdominal exercise that offers several benefits for those looking to strengthen their core and improve overall fitness.

name: Leg Scissors
benefits: promotes greater flexibility and mobility. The wide range of motion required for each leg to move in an alternating scissor pattern helps in stretching the muscles, particularly the hip flexors and hamstrings
